title: Security group allows 0.0.0.0/0 on port 22
message: The security group contains inbound or outbound rules that allow unrestricted access (0.0.0.0/0 or ::/0). This exposes your instances to the public internet and increases attack surface.

title: Root account without MFA
message: The AWS account root user does not have Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) enabled, leaving the account at high risk of compromise.
